version_description:
- Added co-op babies list
- Updated synergy and interaction information on items
- Bug fixes

If you like it, please rate it! Feel free to add suggestions/improvements you would like to see or report bugs/problems you had with the app

- Added co-op babies list
- Updated synergy and interaction information on items
- Bug fixes

If you like it, please rate it! Feel free to add suggestions/improvements you would like to see or report bugs/problems you had with the app

- Items, Bosses: search and filtering and vice-versa should work properly now
- Bug fixes: the app should be more stable on iOS8, fixed a bug in search that was affecting a small number of users
- Co-op babies: added some missing descriptions and fixed a problem with filtering
- Achievements: added the ingame secret number of the achievement

If you like it, please rate it and share it with your friends! It really means a lot!
Feel free to add suggestions/improvements you would like to see or report bugs/problems you had with the app

- Items, Bosses: search and filtering and vice-versa should work properly now
- Bug fixes: the app should be more stable on iOS8, fixed a bug in search that was affecting a small number of users
- Co-op babies: added some missing descriptions and fixed a problem with filtering
- Achievements: added the ingame secret number of the achievement

If you like it, please rate it and share it with your friends! It really means a lot!
Feel free to add suggestions/improvements you would like to see or report bugs/problems you had with the app

- Performance improvements (navigating through item lists should now feel smoother and faster)
- Visual improvements
- Bug fixes (small stuff)
- Some items with character/tear appearance were not showing the correct info, it should be fixed now
- Update info (characters, items)

If you like it, how about a rate on the app store?

This is the biggest update so far, in preparation for the next and last DLC, Repentance:

- Small redesign of the whole app (content should be/feel easier to read)
- Added "Dark Mode" support (iOS 13 only)
- It is now possible to search for visual description, for instance, searching for "syringe" will show all items that look like a syringe (available for Items, Cards, and Trinkets)
- Search will now include almost every category (previously only Items, Cards, Trinkets, and Pickups)
- Improved search mode inside each list page
- For every detail page, there's now an option to report missing or incorrect info
- Fixed incorrect names and description on some Items
- Item Pools is now back to the menu
- Performance on search should be improved
- Added quick actions
- Added Antibirth MOD floors
- Added additional synergies to some trinkets and cards
- Added game filters to multiple lists pages
- Bug fixes (stability and performance while navigating the app should be improved)

If you like it, how about a rate on the app store?
Feel free to add suggestions/improvements you would like to see or report bugs/problems you had with the app

This is the biggest update so far, in preparation for the next and last DLC, Repentance:

- Small redesign of the whole app (content should be/feel easier to read)
- Added "Dark Mode" support (iOS 13 only)
- It is now possible to search for visual description, for instance, searching for "syringe" will show all items that look like a syringe (available for Items, Cards, and Trinkets)
- Search will now include almost every category (previously only Items, Cards, Trinkets, and Pickups)
- Improved search mode inside each list page
- For every detail page, there's now an option to report missing or incorrect info
- Fixed incorrect names and description on some Items
- Item Pools is now back to the menu
- Performance on search should be improved
- Added quick actions
- Added Antibirth MOD floors
- Added additional synergies to some trinkets and cards
- Added game filters to multiple lists pages
- Bug fixes (stability and performance while navigating the app should be improved)
